content.rendered:
Capital Campaign Online Donation

GEOKC Building Project Seva (Donation)

GEOKC Building Project - Facilities 1: GEOKC Bhawan, Ashram Bhawan, GEOKC Multi-purpose Hall, GEOKC Auditorium, Samadhi Shrine (select any amount):

Donation Level Donation Amount Quantity
Level 1 - Facilities 1 $5,000
Level 2 - Facilities 1 $10,000
Level 3 - Facilities 1 $15,000
Level 4 - Facilities 1 $20,000
Level 5 - Facilities 1 $25,000
Sub Total

GEOKC Building Project - Facilities 2: Ashram Library, Ashram Temple, Temple’s Icons (joint statues of Radha-Krishna), Worship Essentials, Guru Inheritance Temple (statue of Main Head Guru of GEOKC)

Donation Level Donation Amount Quantity
Level 1 - Facilities 2 $5,000
Level 2 - Facilities 2 $7,000
Level 3 - Facilities 2 $9,000
Level 4 - Facilities 2 $11,000
Level 5 - Facilities 2 $13,000
Sub Total

GEOKC Architecture Works

Bhakti (Devotion) Art and Architecture Works (Lord Krishna’s devotional worship art works as a part of specific attraction of Facilities including all parts) (select any amount):

Donation Level Donation Amount Quantity
Level 1 - Art and Architecture Works $5,000
Level 2 - Art and Architecture Works $6,000
Level 3 - Art and Architecture Works $7,000
Level 4 - Art and Architecture Works $8,000
Level 5 - Art and Architecture Works $9,000
Sub Total

Building Art and Architecture Works (the specific marble and color design of Facilities including all parts) (select any amount):

Donation Level Donation Amount Quantity
Level 1 - Building Art and Architecture Works $5,000
Level 2 - Building Art and Architecture Works $6,000
Level 3 - Building Art and Architecture Works $7,000
Level 4 - Building Art and Architecture Works $8,000
Level 5 - Building Art and Architecture Works $9,000
Sub Total

Bhoomi Daan Seva (land donation) (select any amount):

Donation Level Donation Amount Quantity
Level 1 - land donation $5,000
Level 2 - land donation $7,000
Level 3 - land donation $9,000
Level 4 - land donation $11,000
Level 5 - land donation $13,000
Sub Total

Specific Needs Awareness Plan: GEOKC Facilities Essentials: ⦁ Kitchens Main Appliances ⦁ Kitchen Dining Hall Setting ⦁ Kitchen General Items ⦁ Furniture For: ⦁ GEOKC Bhawan (building) ⦁ Ashram Bhawan (building includes Library) ⦁ GEOKC Multi-purpose Hall ⦁ GEOKC Auditorium ⦁ All Offices Essentials ⦁ Office Equipment ⦁ Decoration Items (select any amount):

Donation Level Donation Amount Quantity
Level 1 - Specific Needs Awareness Plan $2,000
Level 2 - Specific Needs Awareness Plan $3,000
Level 3 - Specific Needs Awareness Plan $4,000
Level 4 - Specific Needs Awareness Plan $5,000
Level 5 - Specific Needs Awareness Plan $6,000
Sub Total

Well Wishing Opportunity: For the constitutional role of major donors to keep GEOKC programs always constant as their help to build GEOKC Facilities (select any amount):

Donation Level Donation Amount Quantity
Level 1 - Well Wishing Opportunity $1,000
Level 2 - Well Wishing Opportunity $2,000
Level 3 - Well Wishing Opportunity $3,000
Level 4 - Well Wishing Opportunity $4,000
Level 5 - Well Wishing Opportunity $5,000
Sub Total

Natural Surrounding Areas & Beauty: ⦁ Indoor Garden ⦁ Outdoor Garden ⦁ Fountains ⦁ Displays, Signs. Lightening (select any amount):

Donation Level Donation Amount Quantity
Level 1 - Natural Surrounding Areas & Beauty $1,000
Level 2 - Natural Surrounding Areas & Beauty $2,000
Level 3 - Natural Surrounding Areas & Beauty $3,000
Level 4 - Natural Surrounding Areas & Beauty $4,000
Level 5 - Natural Surrounding Areas & Beauty $5,000
Sub Total

Thank You!
